member.summary: Whether this content item is published.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Autoroute.Core.Indexes.AutoroutePartIndex.Latest
member.summary: Whether this content item is latest.

member.summary: Only used if content item is contained in a container.

member.summary: Only used if the content item is contained in a container.

member.summary: Whether to make the content item the homepage once it's published.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Autoroute.Models.AutoroutePart.Disabled
member.summary: Whether to disable autoroute generation for this content item. When disabled the path is no longer validated, or generated.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Autoroute.Models.AutoroutePart.RouteContainedItems

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Autoroute.Models.AutoroutePart.Absolute
